Title: Fifty Shades Darker
Writer: Niall Leonard (screenplay by), E.L. James (based on the novel by)
Actors: Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Eric Johnson, Eloise Mumford
Plot: Christian and Ana decide to rekindle their relationship, except this time there are no more rules or punishments. As they begin to get used to their newfound relationship, Christian's past begins to haunt Ana as Christian struggles with his innermost thoughts.
Production: Michael De Luca, Perfect World Pictures
